items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has to go anywhere today.
Tom wasn't kicked out of school, but Mary was.
Tom can't possibly be a rich people say he is.
What Tom did was pretty impressive, wasn't it?
Tom can't possibly be as old people say he is.
We're still waiting for permission to do that.
I trusted someone who didn't deserve my trust.
Make sure that you do that before you go home.
Tom said that some teenagers had attacked him.
Tom says he hasn't had a drink in three years.
When should I start thinking about retirement?
Tom said he's definitely not going to do that.
We weren't ready for what was about to happen.
We weren't ready for what was going to happen.
There's a good chance Tom may leave on Monday.
Many wounded men were left on the battlefield.
Tom and Mary knew just how to help each other.
The first question Tom asked me made no sense.
The last thing Tom wanted to be was different.
Where are the apples you bought the other day?
I was so excited that I couldn't eat anything.
Tom accepted the job offer without hesitation.
Tom isn't the type of person to call it quits.
I believe we've overlooked an important issue.
We know that Tom is unlikely to do that today.
We didn't know we weren't supposed to do that.
We didn't know that you were going to do that.
We didn't know Tom was going to do that today.
We all know that Tom isn't willing to do that.
Unlike some of us, Tom can do that quite well.
Tom was convinced that Mary shouldn't do that.
Tom was convinced he no longer had to do that.
Tom was convinced Mary didn't want to do that.
Tom was convinced Mary didn't need to do that.
Tom was convinced Mary didn't have to do that.
Tom told me that Mary doesn't want to do that.
Tom told Mary that he needed to do that today.
Tom told Mary either he or she had to do that.
Tom swears he hasn't done that more than once.
Tom says he knows that Mary wanted to do that.
Tom said that he thought that I would do that.
Tom said he was very interested in doing that.
Tom reminded Mary she shouldn't be doing that.
Tom really thought that Mary ought to do that.
Tom says that his wife doesn't understand him.
Tom tried his best to look like he understood.
I don't know if anyone will be waiting for me.
We're supposed to hand in our papers by today.
I've decided to postpone my trip to Australia.
I'll be working on my report all day tomorrow.
